funCategoryGuideline.title: FUN Category Guidelines
funCategoryGuideline.message:
This category is for break time content to reduce learning fatigue.

⚠️ Algorithm Exposure Notice:
FUN content has lower recommendation algorithm exposure compared to study content. Since GrowSnap is a learning-focused platform, study-related content is prioritized in recommendations.

✅ Suitable content:
• Pure entertainment unrelated to studying
• Memes, comedy, humor videos
• Animal/cute videos
• Daily vlogs, challenges
• Dance, music, cooking, travel
• Positive motivation

❌ Unsuitable content:
• Profanity, hate speech
• Sexual/violent content
• Advertising/spam content
